ratings.comment: Very nice person, but not very good at explaining concepts. He does a lot of examples on the board with little explanation. If you want to do well in this class, you should put in a lot of effort studying on your own outside of class.

Amazing teacher. Willing to keep answering my questions even after office hours ended by an hour. Great at explaining most things but sometimes goes too fast. His tests are straightforward and only things that were covered in class. He is also very funny. Very good.
Amazing professor. Explains each topic in the syllabus well. Listen to what he says in class and his review session before exams to do well in tests.

He knows the material well and class isn't too bad if you just do the homework on time and if you're confused, you can always watch the videos on the HW that guide you through the problems, or the "practice another version"option that is also listed on it. The class itself was structured very well,only rushed if he wanted us to make time to review.

If you're quiet in his class and listen to him attentively, you'll understand everything he says and you'll understand 222. He genuinely tries to make 222 easier for the students but you just need to give him time to explain what he has to.
